problems.title: Find Two Non-Repeating Numbers
problems.description: In an array where every element appears twice except two elements, find those two elements using XOR.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size, always even)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the two non-repeating numbers in ascending order, space-separated

problems.title: Maximum XOR of Two Numbers
problems.description: Find the maximum XOR of any two numbers in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Total Set Bits
problems.description: Count total number of set bits in all numbers from 1 to n.
problems.outputFormat: Print total count of set bits

problems.title: Minimum XOR Pair
problems.description: Find the minimum XOR value of any pair of elements in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Swap All Odd and Even Bits
problems.description: Swap all odd and even bits of a number (bit 0 with bit 1, bit 2 with bit 3, etc.).
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after swapping odd and even bits
